label{display:block;font-weight:400;margin-left:10px}.cg-league-chooser-container .cg-league-chooser-criteria .controls label.checkbox,.cg-league-chooser-container .cg-league-chooser-criteria .controls label.radio{margin-top:10px}.cg-league .cg-league-chooser-container .cg-league-chooser-criteria .controls label.checkbox+.checkbox,.cg-league .cg-league-chooser-container
